alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 6:48PM CDT until June 24 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR WESTERN MARSHALL...WESTERN RED LAKE...NORTHWESTERN POLK...WESTERN PENNINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN WALSH COUNTIES... At 647 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Old Mill State Park to 6 miles south of Euclid, moving east at 40 mph. At 646 PM CDT, a 88 mph wind gust was reported 7 miles north of East Grand Forks. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS FOR WARREN, RADIUM, AND OLD MILL STATE PARK. HAZARD...90 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged or destroyed. Homes and businesses will have substantial roof and window damage. Expect extensive tree damage and power outages. These severe storms will be near... Old Mill State Park around 650 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Dorothy, Gentilly, Huot, Newfolden, Wylie, Red Lake Falls, Perault and Marcoux. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 162 and 174. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...90 MPH
info.instruction: This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION with tornado like wind speeds expected. Mobile homes and high profile vehicles are especially susceptible to winds of this magnitude and may be overturned. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms have the potential to cause serious injury and significant property damage.
